#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    string letters;
    int length;
    int testCases;
    cin >> testCases;
    for(int x = 1; x<=testCases; x++)
    {
    cin >> letters;
    length = letters.length();

    for(int x = (length/2) - 1; x > -1; x--)
        cout << letters[x];
    for(int x = length-1; x > (length/2) - 1; x--)
        cout << letters[x];

        cout << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
